channel.title: How can i run my server on a dedicated and mysql
channel.description: hey i wanna run my server threw sql where they can register and stuff threw my vbulletin forums and be its name on the game. could any1 help plz?

item.title: How can i run my server on a dedicated and mysql
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“did 1 tb u, post:1, topic:244102”]hey i wanna run my server threw sql where they can register and stuff threw my vbulletin forums and be its name on the game. could any1 help plz?[/quote]It depends. Is your VBulletin forum hosted on your own(or a host where you can delete/add/edit w/e you want)?

Or is the VBulletin site hosting it?
